content.text: Create an interactive gaming platform with leaderboards and tournaments

Creating a full interactive gaming platform with user authentication, real-time leaderboards, and tournament management using vanilla HTML, CSS (TailwindCSS), and JavaScript. The platform will include a homepage with game selection, user registration/login (localStorage for simplicity), a leaderboard page showing player rankings, and a tournaments page where users can join and see tournament details. Navigation between pages will be included with clear call-to-actions. The UI will be modern, responsive, and use Font Awesome icons. The leaderboard and tournament data will be stored and manipulated in localStorage to simulate a backend. The platform will feature interactive elements, animations, and polished styling to deliver a premium experience. Separate files will be created for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a consistent structure.
